md:
giải nghĩa từ "aside" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Aside** (preposition)

* Meaning: beside; next to
* Example: She sat aside him on the couch.
* Related words: alongside, beside, next to

**Aside** (noun)

* Meaning: a remark or comment made in a casual or informal way
* Example: He made an aside about the weather during the presentation.
* Related words: comment, remark, note

**Aside** (verb)

* Meaning: to put or set something aside; to ignore or dismiss something
* Example: She set aside her doubts and decided to take the risk.
* Related words: put aside, set aside, ignore

**Aside** (adverb)

* Meaning: to one side; away from the main point or topic
* Example: He spoke aside to his colleague during the meeting.
* Related words: to one side, away, separately
html:
giải nghĩa từ "aside" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Aside (preposition)

  • Meaning: beside; next to
  • Example: She sat aside him on the couch.
  • Related words: alongside, beside, next to

Aside (noun)

  • Meaning: a remark or comment made in a casual or informal way
  • Example: He made an aside about the weather during the presentation.
  • Related words: comment, remark, note

Aside (verb)

  • Meaning: to put or set something aside; to ignore or dismiss something
  • Example: She set aside her doubts and decided to take the risk.
  • Related words: put aside, set aside, ignore

Aside (adverb)

  • Meaning: to one side; away from the main point or topic
  • Example: He spoke aside to his colleague during the meeting.
  • Related words: to one side, away, separately
